title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted dark red silk ornamented with cut steel beads in star and zig-zag patterns; small evenly spaced diamond pattern of the same beads cover the rest of the area.  Two steel rings for closing; ornate steel beads pendants at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, steel
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-28.
